mapper.insert: INSERT INTO collection_item (collection_id, post_id, created_at) VALUES (#{collectionId}, #{postId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM collection_item WHERE collection_id = #{collectionId} AND post_id = #{postId}
mapper.select: SELECT collection_id, post_id, created_at FROM collection_item WHERE collection_id = #{collectionId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
